com.pump.icon

Class GlyphIcon

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pump.icon.GlyphIcon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.swing.Icon

    public class GlyphIcon
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.Icon
    A silhouette icon of a character glyph.

    Here are some samples:

    Note Recycle Writing Hand
    Flower Warning

    • Constructor Detail

      • GlyphIcon

        public GlyphIcon(java.awt.Font font,
                 char ch,
                 int maxSize,
                 java.awt.Color color)
        Create a GlyphIcon.
        Parameters:
        font - the font to extract a glyph from.
        ch - the character to retrieve the glyph of.
        maxSize - the maximum width or height. The glyph will be scaled proportionally to fit within a square that is (maxSize x maxSize) pixels
        color - the color to paint the glyph in.

    • Method Detail

      • getPreferredSize

        public java.awt.Dimension getPreferredSize(int possibleWidth,
                                           int possibleHeight)
        Return the preferred size of this icon if it were scaled to fit within (possibleWidth x possibleHeight).
        Parameters:
        possibleWidth - the maximum possible width.
        possibleHeight - the maximum possible height.
        Returns:
        the dimensions this icon should be scaled to. Either the width or the height should approximately match the arguments.
